file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 26-23-02-02 - BAGGAGE-COMPARTMENT FIRE EXTINGUISHER BOTTLE CARTRIDGE - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL BAGGAGE-COMPARTMENT FIRE EXTINGUISHER BOTTLE CARTRIDGE - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES EFFECTIVITY: CLASS-C BAGGAGE COMPARTMENT 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to replace and discard the cartridge of the baggage- compartment fire-extinguisher bottles. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY BAGGAGE FIRE EXTINGUISHER BOT- CLASS-C BAGGAGE 26-23-02-960-801-A ♦ TLES CARTRIDGE - REPLACEMENT/ COMPARTMENT DISCARD EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 26-23-02 Page 1 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 26-23-02-960-801-A EFFECTIVITY: CLASS-C BAGGAGE COMPARTMENT 2. BAGGAGE FIRE EXTINGUISHER BOTTLES CARTRIDGE - REPLACEMENT/DISCARD A. General (1) To do the task, refer to the instructions in the Pacific Scientific CMM ATA 26-23-46 (for high- rate bottle) and Pacific Scientific CMM ATA 26-23-47 (for metering bottle). B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION BAGGAGE FIRE EXTINGUISHER BOTTLES - RE- AMM TASK 26-23-01-000-801-A/400 MOVAL BAGGAGE FIRE EXTINGUISHER BOTTLES - INSTAL- AMM TASK 26-23-01-400-801-A/400 LATION Pacific Scientific CMM ATA 26-23-46 - Pacific Scientific CMM ATA 26-23-47 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 272 272DR Electronic compartment D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Ladder To get access to the electronic compartment 1 available F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Electronic compartment I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Remove the baggage fire extinguisher bottles ( AMM TASK 26-23-01-000-801-A/400). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 960-801-A/200 26-23-02 Page 2 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Discard Baggage Fire Extinguishing Bottles (high rate and metering)Cartridges SUBTASK 960-002-A WARNING: THE CARTRIDGES ARE EXPLOSIVE DEVICES. ACCIDENTAL DETONATION OF A CARTRIDGE CAN CAUSE INJURY. DURING THE TASK, OBEY ALL SAFETY PRECAUTIONS CONTAINED IN THE PACIFIC SCIENTIFIC CMM. (1) Remove and discard the cartridge. Refer to the last revision of Pacific Scientific CMM ATA 26-23-46 (for high-rate bottle) and Pacific Scientific CMM ATA 26-23-47 (for metering bottle). (2) Install the new cartridge. Refer to the last revision of Pacific Scientific CMM ATA 26-23-46 (for high-rate bottle) and Pacific Scientific CMM ATA 26-23-47 (for metering bottle). K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Install the baggage fire extinguisher bottles (AMM TASK 26-23-01-400-801-A/400).
